
### wait/waitpid  {.smaller}


* `pid_t waitpid(pid_t pid, int *status, int options)`
* wait for a child process (with pid=`pid`) to finish
* sets `*status` to its "status information"
<hr class="vspace" />
* `pid=-1` â†’ wait for _any_ child process instead

   * `pid=0` almost the same

* options? see manual page (command `man waitpid`)

   * `0` --- no options



### waitpid example  {.smaller}


```c
#include <sys/wait.h>
...

child_pid = fork();
if (child_pid > 0) {
    /* Parent process */
    int status;
    waitpid(child_pid, &status, 0);
} else if (child_pid == 0) {
    /* Child process */
    ...
    /* Eventually exit */
    ...

```
